content.heroIntro: VELAPI GOLF represents an exceptional opportunity to own a luxury property in one of Costa Blanca's most coveted golf communities. Developed by the prestigious GIBAX developer, this exclusive collection of villas and penthouses is located in the heart of Lo Sereno Golf in Los Alcazares, Murcia. With prices starting from just €315,000, VELAPI GOLF offers sophisticated modern living with 2-3 bedrooms, premium finishes, and direct access to championship golf courses. Set against the backdrop of the Mediterranean lifestyle, these properties combine investment potential with the perfect climate and amenities for both full-time living and holiday retreats. Scheduled for completion on 01-01-2027, VELAPI GOLF delivers exceptional value at 40% less than comparable Spanish island markets, making it an intelligent choice for discerning buyers seeking quality, location, and strong appreciation potential.

locationSection.intro: Lo Sereno Golf is an established, thriving community in Los Alcazares that seamlessly blends relaxation with an active lifestyle. This picturesque area in Murcia has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean living combined with world-class golf facilities. The region offers excellent access to healthcare, international education, and vibrant local culture while maintaining the tranquility of a resort-style environment. With multiple Blue Flag beaches just 20 minutes away and several championship golf courses nearby, Los Alcazares provides the perfect balance of leisure and convenience. The established international community ensures that English is commonly spoken, making daily life comfortable for foreign residents. The area's consistent property appreciation of 8% year-on-year reflects growing confidence in the market and the region's appeal as both a lifestyle destination and smart investment.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VELAPI GOLF?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; regional hospital within 30 minutes plus private clinics; several championship golf courses within the resort and surrounding area; international schools with British curriculum options; and excellent restaurant and entertainment options in the local area.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-residents need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should consult with a Spanish property lawyer to understand local regulations and requirements. GIBAX and our team can connect you with qualified legal professionals.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property purchase price, typical costs include: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registration fees (0.5%), and legal fees (1-2%). Property taxes and utility setup also apply. Our team can provide a detailed cost breakdown for VELAPI GOLF purchases.
